AppendParameter

public static string AppendParameter(string $strUrl, string $strParameter)

Append parameter in the form key1=value&other=value2 to an existing url like http://www.vnoel.com?cmd=list#here
An anchor will be preserved.

Parameters

$strUrl -
$strParameter -

ImplodeParameterArray

public string ImplodeParameterArray(mixed $theArray, mixed $name=null, bool $skipBlank=true, bool $rawurlencodeParamName=false)

Implodes a multidimensional-array into GET-parameters (eg. &param[key][key2]=value2&param[key][key3]=value3)
This can be used statically. (But can't be declared static because of $this->_strPrefix :-/ )

Parameters

$theArray -
$name -
$skipBlank -
$rawurlencodeParamName -

ExplodeParameter

public static array ExplodeParameter(mixed $strParameter, bool $blnMultidimensional=true)

Explodes GET-parameters (eg. &param[key][key2]=value2&param[key][key3]=value3) into a one or multidimensional array
Supported url/parameter formats:
&param...
?param...
something?param...
/something http://something

Parameters

$strParameter -
$blnMultidimensional -

PrefixHttp

public static string PrefixHttp(string $strUrl)

Prefixes a domain for example with http:// If ':/' is found in the string nothing is prefixed

Parameters

$strUrl -

Shorten

public static string Shorten(string $strUrl)

Returns a hostname from an url. This is useful for link names which should be shortened
